Articles.Content: okay so i saw on the spaceport that a new mod was added to help people with handicapped needs to play the game. the mod is for an on screen control for people that cant use a keyboard. while i dont need it it just makes me so happy that as a community people are thinking about and wanting to help bring the game to even more people and arent making fun of those that have handicaps.
